unnormalised: Hey everyone! Any news on Bumrah's back? Hope he's recovering well, especially with the World Cup around the corner. Remember Kapil Dev's injury days? Big scare then! Also, what about Hardik's shoulder? Last I heard from the BCCI was vague. Wishing them a "Kuch Kuch Hota Hai" recovery - fast and impactful! Chennai fans are waiting eagerly!
